Key player - Liverpool
Key player - Tottenham
Recent background
Liverpool
Liverpool, which in a way continues to be mired in crisis, got some breathing room for a quiet week after earning a well-deserved 2-0 victory against Brighton & Hove Albion with a brace from Hugo Ekitike, securing its third win in an unbeaten streak that stretched to five games in all competitions.
Sitting in seventh place with 26 points and needing to get back on track to be in contention for the Premier League title, Arne Slot's team has only one path forward: victory.
Tottenham
With 22 points, Tottenham are eleventh in the table and now have the responsibility of winning again to stay close to those fighting for a place in European competitions next season.
The match will be played at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
This stadium is also preparing to be one of the venues for the next UEFA Euro, which will be held in 2028.
Hello to all VAVEL readers!
My name is Silvia Hoyos and I will be your host for this match. We will bring you pre-match analysis, score updates and live news here on VAVEL.
